detail_desc: Short skirt in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist, wide smocking at the top and tiers to the hem. Partly lined in viscose.
Trousers in softly draping satin with a slight sheen. High, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist and wide, gently tapered legs with diagonal side seams.

Trousers woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, two detachable belts with metal D-rings and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, welt back pockets, pleats at the top and wide, gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a smocked weave that is fitted down to the knee and finishes in a wide flounce. High waist with wide, covered elastication. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a smocked weave that is fitted down to the knee and finishes in a wide flounce. High waist with wide, covered elastication. Unlined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in soft twill made from cotton and Tencel™ lyocell with wide peak lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with a detachable, adjustable buttoned strap at the cuffs. Front pockets, a wide, detachable belt with metal eyelets at the waist, and a single back vent. Half-lined.

Calf-length kaftan in a softly draping, patterned linen and viscose weave with a mandarin collar, concealed buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long, wide raglan sleeves with pleats at the cuffs for added width, and wide, buttoned cuffs. Tapered waist with shaping seams and pleats, discreet pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Boxy jacket in washed denim with notch lapels, a concealed, diagonal zip down the front and front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab with D-rings at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. One patterned pair.
Calf-length dress in soft, heavily draping viscose jersey with a turtle neck, concealed zip at the top and long sleeves. Fitted bodice and a skirt that flares from the hips. Unlined.
Fitted top in jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Fitted top in jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned mesh. Draped bodice with pleats at the sides, a seam at the waist and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey-lined bodice and jersey underskirt.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned mesh. Draped bodice with pleats at the sides, a seam at the waist and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey-lined bodice and jersey underskirt.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Long, raglan sleeves with gathered seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Long, raglan sleeves with gathered seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Narrow cut at the top with a narrow, smocked trim around the neckline, and an elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.

Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Narrow cut at the top with a narrow, smocked trim around the neckline, and an elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a print motif and appliqués at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a print motif and appliqués at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a print motif and appliqués at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side and back pockets.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side and back pockets.
Longer-style shorts in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and patch leg pockets.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, welt side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders. Press-studs on one shoulder, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders. Press-studs on one shoulder, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and gently dropped shoulders. Press-studs on one shoulder, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Oversized coat in woven fabric with a crisp finish. Collar, press-studs down the front, large patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets, and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.

Jacket in grained imitation leather with a collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets, flap front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined. The jacket is PETA Approved Vegan-certified and meets PETA’s requirements for vegan products. This certification guarantees that the product is entirely free from materials and substances of animal origin.

Slightly shorter, oversized, double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with notch lapels. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.

Slightly shorter, oversized, double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend with notch lapels. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable tab at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.

Lightweight trenchcoat in a crisp weave with a stand-up collar, buttons at the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a detachable, adjustable strap at the cuffs, a detachable belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with a pile-lined collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides. Pile lining.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-on tie belt at the front, and diagonal side pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-on tie belt at the front, and diagonal side pockets.
Belt in imitation suede with a heart-shaped metal buckle decorated with sparkly stones. Width 3 cm.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hairband in an organic cotton weave with a decorative knot at the top and covered elastication at the back.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in an airy, organic cotton weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short, wide raglan sleeves.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Empire-line dress in textured, double-weave organic cotton with flutter sleeves and buttons down the front. Lined at the top.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Sleeveless dress in lightweight, organic, slub cotton sweatshirt fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps and gathered tiers. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut coat in bouclé made from a wool blend. Double-breasted with notch lapels and large patch front pockets. Lined.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in a patterned, organic cotton weave with a sailor collar, buttons at the back and contrasting colour trims around the collar and hem. Lined.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Vest top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Vest top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.

Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Legs with taped details, a small reflective print at one side and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Legs with taped details, a small reflective print at one side and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a glittery print, padded edge and grosgrain loop at the back. Elasticated lacing at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Jacket in soft pile with sections in woven fabric. High collar, press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Biker jacket in soft, brushed fabric with notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped front pockets and a decorative tab and fake button at the sides. Lined.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lace trim at the hem. The cups are lined with fabric made from recycled polyester.
